statements: DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_x > 10 AND hand_measurement_y < 5;
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 123 AND hand_measurement_x = 10.5;
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_y < 20 AND employee_id = 456;
DELETE FROM employee_movements WHERE employee_id = 123 AND movement_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_1 > 10 OR hand_measurement_3 < 5;
DELETE FROM facility_access WHERE access_type = 'Restricted' AND access_id = 202;
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_id IN (SELECT hand_id FROM employee WHERE employee_department = 'Engineering');
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_id = 5 AND employee_id = 1002 AND hand_shape = 'oval';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE area_id = 2001 AND status = 'Unauthorized';
